attributes.action: Stop Ownership Of Multiple News Outlets.
attributes.additional_details: That in the interests of Democracy the present situation of multiple ownership of all news media needs to stop.A law to prevent any person,family or organisation owning more than one outlet including newspapers magazines and TV news media should be placed on the statute book.For instance you could not own both a newspaper and a TV News Outlet.The present system of Group Ownership gives undue control and influence to a single entity.Groups such as News International/Corporation should be broken up
